title: Magic of a name
creator_credit: R.H.R. Productions, Film Producers Guild, Ronald H. Riley and David Cobham
brief_description: An account of the work and products of the Rolls-Royce group of companies. Surveying the activities of the main divisions - aero engines; commercial and military petrol engines; diesel engines, and motor cars - illustrates products using the sponsor’s engines, including the Comet 4 and other aircraft, Rolls-Royce and Bentley cars, trucks, locomotives and tractors.
